comment:
Full-time staff:Employees who work a standard number of hours per week, typically 40 hours, and receive a fixed salary or wage for that week.
Part-time staff:Employees who work fewer hours per week than full-time staff, often on a flexible schedule, and are paid based on the number of hours worked.
Total number of staff hours:The sum of the hours worked by all staff members, including both full-time and part-time employees, required to meet the labor demand for mail delivery.
